law.catch_line: A license expires on the date set by the Secretary, unless the license is renewed as provided in thi...

text.section: A license expires on the date set by the Secretary, unless the license is renewed as provided in this section.

Before the license expires, the licensee may renew its license for an additional term, if the licensee:
Otherwise is entitled to the license;
Pays to the Department the renewal fee set by the Secretary and any outstanding licensing or proficiency testing fees; and
Submits to the Secretary:
A renewal application on the form that the Secretary requires; and
Satisfactory evidence of compliance with all standards and requirements set under this subtitle and in regulations adopted pursuant to this subtitle.
The Secretary shall renew the license of each licensee who meets the requirements of this section.
